DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect Sodium Bicarbonate bolus injection patient undergoing emergent coronary procedure prevention contrast-induced nephropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Contrast-Induced Nephropathy With Sodium Bicarbonate Bolus Injection
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate effect Sodium Bicarbonate bolus injection patient undergoing emergent coronary procedure prevention contrast-induced nephropathy.The End point development contrast-induced nephropathy .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing emergent coronary procedure ( within 60 minute admission ) On dialysis Pregnancy Past use bicarbonate NAcetylCystein 48hr Past exposure contrast medium 48hr Circulatory insufficiency lactic acidosis .
